channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Buried In Debt: Report Finds Government Spending Per Person Soared 10,000 Percent Over Last Century
item.description: 'While American families and businesses find a way to do more with less, the government does less with more,' said OpenTheBooks' John Hart.
